title: Emre Can: Juventus confirm signing of midfielder from Liverpool - BBC Sport
snippet: Emre Can has finalised his move to Juventus from Liverpool on a four-year deal. The 24-year-old Germany international joins the Italian champions on a free transfer.

title: Emre Can transfer rumours and news

title: Juventus sign Emre Can on four-year contract - ESPN
snippet: "The versatile midfielder, who can also operate in defence, joins Juventus after four years with Liverpool FC," an announcement on the Juventus website said.
